div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 628 Bosneagu, c. 65 km. ESE of Bucha- rest, Rumania, 1962 Burial: early 1st cent. B.C. (Mitrea) Contents: 31 AR. Pot hoard Maroneia: 1 spread-flan tetradr. Thasos: 30 spread-flan tetradr. incl. imit. Disposition: Calarasi Mitrea, SCIV 1963, p. 467 Atanasiu, RevMuz 4 (1964), pp. 51-2, illus.
